title: Chief Executives in the Cockpitâ€”When Presidents Take to the Skies
description: In this episode we look at all U.S. presidents who served as fighter pilots or in any sort of military combat role. We also look at the first president to fly (it was in a rinky-dink Wright Bros. flyer), the development of Air Force One, and the theory that aviators make better leaders.
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
